doc.field: Record Group 8. Alumni and alumni-relations (1891-2015; 28.5 linear feet)
Record Group 8. Alumni and alumni-relations (1891-2015; 28.5 linear feet)

Mabel Towne Burnham, long-time Ethical Culture School employee, served in roles including Director of the Summer Play School in the 1920s, and Registrar in the 1930s. The series primarily contains scrapbooks she made during her years at Ethical Culture, along with clippings and ephemera intended for or removed from scrapbooks. It also includes some personal items (such as a diary and account books), and notebooks and printed matter from Essex High School and the Salem Normal School. The bulk of materials were created between 1900 and 1945.
Record Group 8. Alumni and alumni-relations (1891-2015; 28.5 linear feet)
